thread.title: Big Boi's 3rd Solo Album Is Complete
thread.title_full: Big Boi's 3rd Solo Album Is Complete

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Big Boi's 3rd Solo Album Is Complete
text:
Home > Music > Big Boi's 3rd Solo Album Is Complete Big Boi's 3rd Solo Album Is Complete 0 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz  12am New Big Boi coming soon. 
It's been ten years since Outkast released their last album. While Andre 3000 has stayed out of the public eye, flitting into view long enough to drop a guest verse once every three months, Big Boi has released three solo projects: Sir Lucious Left Foot: The Son of Chico Dusty , Vicious Lies and Dangerous Rumors , and 2015 Big Grams collaborative EP with Phantogram. 
Yesterday, on MLK Day,   to announce that he has completed his third solo album. 
"We start our albums on MLK Day, but this year, we're finishing a record on MLK Day," he told the camera. "Very significant. Can't wait to let you hear." A video posted by Big Boi (@therealbigboi) on Jan 16, 2017 at 8:09pm PST < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Jan 17, 2017 at 11:12am 1 View 
  New Big Boi coming soon. 
It's been ten years since Outkast released their last album. While Andre 3000 has stayed out of the public eye, flitting into view long enough to drop a guest verse once every three months, Big Boi has released three solo projects: Sir Lucious Left Foot: The Son of Chico Dusty , Vicious Lies and Dangerous Rumors , and 2015 Big Grams collaborative EP with Phantogram. 
Yesterday, on MLK Day,   to announce that he has completed his third solo album. 
"We start our albums on MLK Day, but this year, we're finishing a record on MLK Day," he told the camera. "Very significant. Can't wait to let you hear."
